original_title: UFC Fight Night 127: Werdum vs. Volkov
overview: UFC Fight Night 127: Werdum vs. Volkov was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that was held on March 17, 2018, at The O2 Arena in London, England. A heavyweight bout between former UFC Heavyweight Champion Fabr√≠cio Werdum and former Bellator Heavyweight Champion Alexander Volkov headlined this event.
title: UFC Fight Night 127: Werdum vs. Volkov
